segments.text: Hi , Steven . Do you have time and chat with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I have plenty of time . What's new ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The new couple next door divorced . Have you heard about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . The Hills ? Who filed for divorce first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess it Is Mrs Hill . She sued for divorce on the grounds of her husband's misconduct with his secretary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , maybe not . It's just your guess . Do not give currency to idle gossip .
segments.speaker: S1
